attributes.action: order the Department for Transport and the British Airports Authority to abide by the wishes of the people of West London and the residents of local Unitary Authorities adjacent to London Heathrow Airport  who do not want a third runway built .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The third runway at London Heathrow is not wanted. It will result in increased noise and pollution to more than 2 million residents in west London and the Thames Valley.The Thames Valley is booming without it. Local Authorities do not want it. The people do not want it

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "order the Department for Transport and the British Airports Authority to abide by the wishes of the people of West London and the residents of local Unitary Authorities adjacent to London Heathrow Airport who do not want a third runway built."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15114.asp

Prime Minister's Office
